are you sure you want to exit from WoWo?
Try to find the unknown word by collecting clues.
• The first step is to choose the language, category, and difficulty level and start the game.
• You will then be given a word.
• In the "Ask" section, you can ask questions with yes or no answers to gather clues. Other types of questions are considered invalid, and your question count does not decrease.
You can determine the correct letter and its position by making attempts:
If the letter is correct and in the right place, it will be in green color.
If the letter is correct but in the wrong place, it will be in yellow color.
If the letter is not in the word, it will be in red color.
• You can use the "Get a Letter" button to watch a short ad and receive a random letter.
• If you want to give up, you can use the "Give Up" button and start a new game.
• You need to find the correct word before your "Incorrect Answer" count runs out.
